Let's start

Dear all,

Thanks for the warm welcome! I’m so looking forward to working with all of you and help you get to know each other a little bit better.

When team members are working in silos, they cannot collaborate effectively, which can lead to missed deadlines, subpar work, poor communication, and general feelings of frustration.

To avoid this, we will encourage communication and collaboration, promote knowledge sharing and encourage networking. 

How? Easy, I will do all the work and guide you all the way.
Welcome onboard!

title: Statistics
description: Flow which displays statistics about company silos to users

elements.content: Let me see!!!

Dear {{ firstName }},

Thank you for taking the time to help me analyze our individual relations and learn more about you.

Based on your feedback I was able to identify our current level of exposure to risk of knowledge silos.

Take a look at where we stand right now, we will work together to break the silos and observe our impact on the trend in the future.
